attributes.action: Redirect Migrant Boats Back to France
attributes.additional_details: Turning these boats back towards France is a responsible measure that prioritizes both our national security and the safety of the migrants.
attributes.background: To allow civilian or government contracted ships to redirect migrant boats crossing the channel back towards France.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
